triples.name: Data mining
triples.relevance: The paper focuses on practical algorithms and techniques for data mining from massive datasets.

triples.name: MapReduce
triples.relevance: The paper presents MapReduce as an important framework for parallelizing algorithms automatically on massive datasets.

triples.name: Locality-sensitive hashing
triples.relevance: The paper explains locality-sensitive hashing as a practical trick for mining data efficiently.

triples.name: Stream processing
triples.relevance: The paper covers stream-processing algorithms for mining data that arrives too fast for exhaustive processing.

triples.name: PageRank
triples.relevance: The paper presents the PageRank algorithm and related tricks for organizing and mining the Web.

triples.name: Frequent pattern discovery
triples.relevance: The paper addresses the problem of finding frequent itemsets as a key data mining task.

triples.name: Cluster analysis
triples.relevance: The paper covers clustering algorithms as a fundamental technique in data mining.

triples.name: Decision tree learning
triples.relevance: The third edition includes new and extended coverage on decision trees for data mining.

triples.name: Deep learning
triples.relevance: The third edition includes new and extended coverage on deep learning techniques.

triples.name: Social network analysis
triples.relevance: The paper covers mining social-network graphs as a key data mining application.
